Title: Kidney racket: Five Mumbai hospital medicos get bail
Content: The five doctors with the LH Hiranandani Hospital in Powai who were arrested in connection with the kidney transplant racket busted at the hospital last month, were on Thursday granted bail on a sure
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: The five doctors with the LH Hiranandani Hospital in Powai who were arrested in connection with the kidney transplant racket busted at the hospital last month, were on Thursday granted bail on a sure
